Title: Relates to including certain out of home services such as transition from a hospital, nursing facility or other institutional setting to the home within home care insurance coverage
Summary: Includes certain out of home services such as transition from a hospital, nursing facility or other institutional setting to the home within home care insurance coverage.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to including certain out of home services such as transition from a hospital, nursing facility or other institutional setting to the home within home care insurance coverage
